test.title: Cards - 1
test.testnote: Note, a card is represented by a suit name followed by a space and the denomination. Line breaks should not occur in the middle of a card. Tens are represented as '10' in the output. There should be no space after the card. Also, when your mouse hovers over a card, (most?) browsers will put up a tool tip with the long name of the card (e.g., "spade jack.")
